data.title: CP December 2021
data.meta_description: CP December 2021 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. God sends messengers throughout history to prepare people to receive his message of salvation. 61 years ago, on this day, one such messenger, Mgr Raymond Mascarenhas, entered eternal life. As a priest and founder of the Sisters of the Little Flower of Bethany, he worked tirelessly in the diocese of Mangalore to renew people's hearts and spread the Good News of Jesus Christ. Even after his death, Mgr Raymond continues his mission of preparing people to receive God's message through the work of the Bethany Sisters around the world.
